Hey. I'm Sebastian (Seb's good). I'm a data engineer based in London working in a boutique team dealing with alternative assets. I've also worked as a data analyst for PwC and as a physicist by training I'm always looking for ways to apply those sexy maths. I also love the outdoors, cooking, and reading.

Latest Work

How Far Can I Go?

Create a personalised map showing how far you can go for set distances of time using the Google API. Built with Python, Shapely, and Google APIs.

Identifying Chinese Calligraphy with Neural Nets

Explored neural networks and their architectures to identify Chinese calligraphy, such as convolutional neural networks, generative adversarial networks, transfer learning.

Built using TensorFlow & TensorBoard.

T-SNE algorithm projecting the model’s representation of Chinese handwriting into 3D space. Each colour is a Chinese character written by different authors.
